author: Computer Programming
quote: Hello, World!

author: Abhijit Naskar
quote: In a world run by algorithms of greed write a code that helps 'n heals.

author: Ada Lovelace
quote: The Analytical Engine weaves algebraic patterns just as the Jacquard loom weaves flowers and leaves.

author: Alan Kay
quote: The most disastrous thing that you can ever learn is your first programming language.

author: Alan Perlis
quote: A language that doesn't affect the way you think about programming is not worth knowing.

author: Alan Perlis
quote: There are two ways to write error-free programs; only the third one works.

author: Andy Harris
quote: Code is there to explain the comments to the computer.

author: Anonymous
quote: It's not a bug, it's a feature.

author: Bill Gates
quote: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.

author: Bjarne Stroustrup
quote: There are only two kinds of languages: the ones people complain about and the ones nobody uses.

author: C.A.R. Hoare
quote: The most important property of a program is whether it accomplishes the intention of its user.

author: Charles Babbage
quote: The whole of the developments and operations of analysis are now capable of being executed by machinery.

author: Charles Wetherell
quote: If you don't know what you want to achieve and why, any code you write is, by definition, incorrect.

author: Chris Pine
quote: Programming isn't about what you know; it's about what you can figure out.

author: Chris Heilmann
quote: Java is to JavaScript what car is to carpet.

author: Cory House
quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it's bad.

author: Damian Conway
quote: Documentation is a love letter that you write to your future self.

author: Daniel Roy
quote: Code is read more than it is written.

author: David Thomas
quote: Delivering good software today is often better than perfect software tomorrow, so finish things and ship.

author: Dennis Ritchie
quote: The only way to learn a new programming language is by writing programs in it.

author: Dmitry Galuscenko
quote: We create programs as much as programs create us.

author: Donald Knuth
quote: If you optimize everything, you will always be unhappy.

author: Donald Knuth
quote: Premature optimization is the root of all evil.

author: Donald Knuth
quote: Programming is the art of telling another human what one wants the computer to do.

author: Douglas Crockford
quote: The good thing about reinventing the wheel is that you can get a round one.

author: Edward V. Berard
quote: Walking on water and developing software from a specification are easy if both are frozen.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: Do one thing every day that scares you. For programmers, that could be writing documentation!

author: Grace Hopper
quote: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.

author: Grace Hopper
quote: The most dangerous phrase in the language is, 'We've always done it this way.'

author: Grady Booch
quote: The function of a good software is to make the complex appear to be simple.

author: Harold Abelson
quote: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.

author: Jeff Atwood
quote: The best code is no code at all.

author: Jeff Sickel
quote: Real programmers don't document. If it was hard to write, it should be hard to understand.

author: John Johnson
quote: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.

author: Ken Thompson
quote: One of my most productive days was throwing away 1,000 lines of code.

author: Kent Beck
quote: Make it work, make it right, make it fast.

author: Larry Niven
quote: That's the thing about people who think they hate computers. What they really hate is lousy programmers.

author: Larry Wall
quote: The three chief virtues of a programmer are: Laziness, Impatience, and Hubris.

author: Linus Torvalds
quote: Software is like sex: it's better when it's free.

author: Linus Torvalds
quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

author: Marijn Haverbeke
quote: The art of programming is the skill of controlling complexity.

author: Muhammad Waseem
quote: Give a man a program, frustrate him for a day. Teach a man to program, frustrate him for a lifetime.

author: Niklaus Wirth
quote: Software is getting slower more rapidly than hardware becomes faster.

author: Paul Graham
quote: In programming, the hard part isn't solving problems, but deciding what problems to solve.

author: Paul Graham
quote: Programming languages differ not so much in what they make possible, but in what they make easy.

author: Peter Norvig
quote: I'm not a great programmer; I'm just a good programmer with great habits.

author: Phil Karlton
quote: There are only two hard things in computer science: cache invalidation and naming things.

author: Ralph Johnson
quote: Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable.

author: Rasmus Lerdorf
quote: I don't care if it works on your machine! We are not shipping your machine!

author: Rich Hickey
quote: Programming is not about typing, it's about thinking.

author: Robert S. Barton
quote: System programmers are the high priests of a low cult.

author: Robert C. Martin
quote: Truth can only be found in one place: the code.

author: Ron Jeffries
quote: Code never lies, comments sometimes do.

author: Seymour Cray
quote: The trouble with programmers is that you can never tell what a programmer is doing until it's too late.

author: Steve McConnell
quote: Good code is its own best documentation.

author: Ted Nelson
quote: A user interface should be so simple that a beginner in an emergency can understand it within ten seconds.

author: Thomas F. Murphy
quote: The best error message is the one that never shows up.

author: Tim Berners-Lee
quote: The Web does not just connect machines, it connects people.

author: Vladimir Kame√±ar
quote: Programming is another way of thinking.
